Title: Wetrix
RichPresencePatch:
Format:Score
FormatType=VALUE

Format:Level
FormatType=VALUE

Lookup:Main-Mode
0x01=Classic
0x02=Practice (Play)
0x03=Pro
0x04=Multiplay
0x05=Challenge
0x06=Handicap
0x07=Practice (Lesson)

Lookup:Sub-Mode
0x01=Classic
0x02=Practice
0x03=Pro
0x04=Multiplay
0x07=Practice
0x80=Raised Land A
0x81=Raised Land B
0x82=Ice Layer A
0x83=Ice Layer B
0x84=Random Land
0x85=Random Hole
0x86=Half Full Drain
0x40=1 Minute
0x41=5 Minute
0x42=100 Pieces
0x43=500 Pieces
0x44=Preset A
0x45=Preset B

Display:
// Menu
?S0x001bf9ac=65532S0x001bf9ac=0?In the Main Menu
// Classic and Pro
?S0xH0af2e8=1S0xH0af2e8=3?Playing @Main-Mode(0x0a35a0) | Score @Score(0xX001bf958) | Level @Number(0x01bf9ac)
// Handicap and Challenge
?N:0xH0af2e8>=64_0xH0af2e8<=134?Playing @Main-Mode(0x0a35a0) (@Sub-Mode(0xaf2e8)) | Score @Score(0xX001bf958) | Level @Number(0x01bf9ac)
// Multiplay
?0xH0af2e8=4?Playing @Main-Mode(0x0a35a0) | Player 1 (@Score(0xW001bee30)) vs. Player 2 (@Score(0xW001ef5b0))
// Practice Play
?0xH0af2e8=2?Playing @Main-Mode(0x0a35a0) | Score @Score(0xX001bf958)
// Practice Lesson
?0xH0af2e8=7?Playing @Main-Mode(0x0a35a0) | Lesson @Number(0xH000a2b54+1)
// Whoops
In the Main Menu

Achievements.Title: Pentahydrate
Achievements.Description: Have five lakes at the same time in any mode except Multiplayer or Practice
Achievements.Author: Pilzkopf

Achievements.Title: Octahydrate
Achievements.Description: Have eight lakes at the same time in any mode except Multiplayer or Practice
Achievements.Author: Pilzkopf

Achievements.Title: A Solitary Swimmer
Achievements.Description: Create a rubber ducky in any mode except Multiplayer or Practice
Achievements.Author: Pilzkopf

Achievements.Title: Three's Company
Achievements.Description: Have three rubber duckies at the same time in any mode except Multiplayer or Practice
Achievements.Author: Pilzkopf

Achievements.Title: Arc of Triumph
Achievements.Description: Create a rainbow in any mode except Multiplayer or Practice
Achievements.Author: Pilzkopf

Achievements.Title: Getting Your Feet Wet
Achievements.Description: Reach Level 2 in Classic Mode
Achievements.Author: Pilzkopf

Achievements.Title: Steady Flow
Achievements.Description: Reach Level 5 in Classic Mode
Achievements.Author: Pilzkopf

Achievements.Title: Grand Reservoir
Achievements.Description: Reach Level 10 in Classic Mode
Achievements.Author: Pilzkopf

Achievements.Title: Plumber's Delight
Achievements.Description: Earn a Repair Bonus of at least 400 points in Classic or Pro Mode
Achievements.Author: Pilzkopf

Achievements.Title: Bomb Voyage
Achievements.Description: Earn a Smart Bomb by having five lakes when leveling up in any mode except Multiplayer or Practice
Achievements.Author: Pilzkopf

Achievements.Title: Tsunami in Tandem
Achievements.Description: Witness two earthquakes in a single game in any mode except Multiplayer or Practice
Achievements.Author: Pilzkopf

Achievements.Title: Pondering the Basics
Achievements.Description: Complete the first four practice lessons in Practice Mode
Achievements.Author: Pilzkopf

Achievements.Title: Reservoir of Knowledge
Achievements.Description: Complete all eight practice lessons in Practice Mode
Achievements.Author: Pilzkopf

Achievements.Title: The Need for Speed
Achievements.Description: Complete Practice Lesson 8 in Split-Screen Mode before the CPU does
Achievements.Author: Pilzkopf

Achievements.Title: Art Class
Achievements.Description: Play a round of Wetrix on a famous painting
Achievements.Author: Pilzkopf

Achievements.Title: Brave New Waters
Achievements.Description: Earn an "ok" rating or better in all modes
Achievements.Author: Pilzkopf

Achievements.Title: Against the Tide
Achievements.Description: Place 40 pieces without rotating in a row in a single game in any mode except Multiplayer or Practice
Achievements.Author: Pilzkopf

Achievements.Title: Spill Not, Want Not
Achievements.Description: Fill the drain by no more than 10% until reaching Level 2 in Classic Mode
Achievements.Author: Pilzkopf

Achievements.Title: [VOID] Lifeguard on Duty
Achievements.Description: Survive for 30 seconds while the drain is about to spill over in any mode except Multiplayer or Practice
Achievements.Author: Pilzkopf

Achievements.Title: Drizzle Disciple
Achievements.Description: Score 100,000 points in Classic Mode
Achievements.Author: Pilzkopf

Achievements.Title: Drench Duelist
Achievements.Description: Score 800,000 points in Classic Mode
Achievements.Author: Pilzkopf

Achievements.Title: Delta Daredevil
Achievements.Description: Score 2,500,000 points in Classic Mode
Achievements.Author: Pilzkopf

Achievements.Title: Wave Watcher
Achievements.Description: Score 80,000 points in Pro Mode
Achievements.Author: Pilzkopf

Achievements.Title: Wetland Whisperer
Achievements.Description: Score 600,000 points in Pro Mode
Achievements.Author: Pilzkopf

Achievements.Title: Whirlpool Wizard
Achievements.Description: Score 2,000,000 points in Pro Mode
Achievements.Author: Pilzkopf

Achievements.Title: Tidal Rush A
Achievements.Description: Score 2,000 points in 1 Minute Challenge in Challenge Mode
Achievements.Author: Pilzkopf

Achievements.Title: Tidal Rush B
Achievements.Description: Score 500,000 points in 5 Minute Challenge in Challenge Mode
Achievements.Author: Pilzkopf

Achievements.Title: Piece By Piece A
Achievements.Description: Score 60,000 points in 100 Pieces Challenge in Challenge Mode
Achievements.Author: Pilzkopf

Achievements.Title: Piece By Piece B
Achievements.Description: Score 1,000,000 points in 500 Pieces Challenge in Challenge Mode
Achievements.Author: Pilzkopf

Achievements.Title: Pattern Recognition A
Achievements.Description: Score 200,000 points in Preset Sequence A in Challenge Mode
Achievements.Author: Pilzkopf

Achievements.Title: Pattern Recognition B
Achievements.Description: Score 200,000 points in Preset Sequence B in Challenge Mode
Achievements.Author: Pilzkopf

Achievements.Title: Raised Expectations A
Achievements.Description: Score 200,000 points in Raised Land A in Handicap Mode
Achievements.Author: Pilzkopf

Achievements.Title: Raised Expectations B
Achievements.Description: Score 200,000 points in Raised Land B in Handicap Mode
Achievements.Author: Pilzkopf

Achievements.Title: Staying Cool A
Achievements.Description: Score 200,000 points in Ice Layer A in Handicap Mode
Achievements.Author: Pilzkopf

Achievements.Title: Staying Cool B
Achievements.Description: Score 200,000 points in Ice Layer B in Handicap Mode
Achievements.Author: Pilzkopf

Achievements.Title: Bringing Back To Balance
Achievements.Description: Score 200,000 points in Random Land in Handicap Mode
Achievements.Author: Pilzkopf

Achievements.Title: Hole New World
Achievements.Description: Score 200,000 points in Random Holes in Handicap Mode
Achievements.Author: Pilzkopf

Achievements.Title: Half the Battle
Achievements.Description: Score 200,000 points in Half Full Drain in Handicap Mode
Achievements.Author: Pilzkopf

Achievements.Title: Makin' Waves
Achievements.Description: Score 1,500,000 points in Pro Mode before reaching Level 10 and without using any Smart Bombs
Achievements.Author: Pilzkopf

Achievements.Title: Leave It up to Chance
Achievements.Description: Score 50,000 points using a tileset that features random tiles in any mode except Multiplayer or Practice
Achievements.Author: Pilzkopf

Achievements.Title: I Love Water So I've Been Playing Wetrix a Lot
Achievements.Description: Score 100 million points in any mode except Multiplayer or Practice
Achievements.Author: Pilzkopf
